languages.text: "Постой, элантах!" {n}Ирлиэт отделяется от собратьев и протягивает вам небольшой оберег.{/n} "Память людей скоротечна, как и ваш век. Но я бы хотела, чтобы у тебя осталось хоть что-то, напоминающее о нашем совместном пути. Считай это благодарностью за все, что ты для меня сделал{mf||а}". {n}Ирлиэт тепло улыбается вам на прощание и исчезает в лесах вместе с остальными эльдарами.{/n}

"Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Постой, элантах!" {n}Ирлиэт отделяется от собратьев и протягивает вам небольшой оберег.{/n} "Память людей скоротечна, как и ваш век. Но я бы хотела, чтобы у тебя осталось хоть что-то, напоминающее о нашем совместном пути. Считай это благодарностью за все, что ты для меня сделал{mf||а}". {n}Ирлиэт тепло улыбается вам на прощание и исчезает в лесах вместе с остальными эльдарами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡Aguarda, elantach!». {n}Yrliet se separa de sus congéneres y te entrega un pequeño amuleto.{/n} «Los recuerdos humanos son tan efímeros como vuestra esperanza de vida. Pero me gustaría darte algo para que te acuerdes del viaje que hemos recorrido juntos. Considéralo una muestra de gratitud por todo lo que has hecho por mí». {n}Yrliet se despide de ti con una cálida sonrisa y desaparece en el bosque junto con los demás Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Aguarda, elantach!». {n}Yrliet se separa de sus congéneres y te entrega un pequeño amuleto.{/n} «Los recuerdos de la gente son tan efímeros como vuestra esperanza de vida. Pero me gustaría darte algo para que te acuerdes del viaje que hemos recorrido juntos. Considéralo una muestra de gratitud por todo lo que has hecho por mí». {n}Yrliet se despide de ti con una cálida sonrisa y desaparece en el bosque junto con los demás Aeldari.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “等等，外界人！”{n}伊莉耶特从她族人的行列中走了出来，递给你一件小小的护身符。{/n}“人类的记忆就像你的生命一样短暂，不过我想送给你一件礼物，作为这场旅程的信物。就当这是我给你的谢礼吧，感谢你做的一切。”{n}伊莉耶特带着温暖的微笑向你告别，之后和其他艾达灵族一起消失在树林里。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “等等，外界人！”{n}伊莉耶特从她族人的行列中走了出来，递给你一件小小的护身符。{/n}“人类的记忆就像你的生命一样短暂，不过我想送给你一件礼物，让你回忆起我们的旅程。就当这是我给你的谢礼吧，感谢你做的一切。”{n}伊莉耶特带着温暖的微笑向你告别，之后和其他艾达灵族一起消失在树林里。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Attendez, elantach ! » {n}Yrliet s'éloigne des autres Aeldaris pour vous remettre une petite amulette.{/n} « Je sais que les souvenirs des humains sont aussi éphémères que vos vies, mais j'aimerais vous donner quelque chose qui vous permettra de vous remémorer notre voyage. Voyez cela comme un gage de gratitude pour tout ce que vous avez fait pour moi. » {n}Yrliet vous dit au revoir avec un sourire chaleureux, puis disparaît dans les bois avec les autres Aeldari.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Elantach, attendez ! » {n}Yrliet s'éloigne des autres Aeldaris pour vous remettre une petite amulette.{/n} « Je sais que les souvenirs des humains sont aussi éphémères que vos vies, mais j'aimerais vous donner quelque chose qui vous permettra de vous remémorer notre voyage. Voyez cela comme un gage de gratitude pour tout ce que vous avez fait pour moi. » {n}Yrliet vous dit au revoir avec un sourire chaleureux, puis disparaît dans les bois avec ses semblables.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「待て、エランタ！」{n}ユリエットは同族から離れ、あなたに小さなお守りを手渡した。{/n}「人の記憶というものは、生きる時間と同じくらい儚いものだ。だが、我々の旅を忘れないでほしい。これは、私にしてくれたことへの感謝の象徴だと思ってくれ」{n}ユリエットは温かな笑みを浮かべてあなたに別れを告げると、他のアエルダリとともに森へ消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「待て、エランタ！」{n}ユリエットは同族から離れ、あなたに小さなお守りを手渡した。{/n}「人の記憶というものは、生きる時間と同じくらい儚いものだ。だが、我々の旅を忘れないでほしい。これは、私にしてくれたことへの感謝の象徴だと思ってくれ」{n}ユリエットは温かな笑みを浮かべてあなたに別れを告げると、他のアエルダリとともに森へ消えていった。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wartet, Elantach!" {n}Yrliet löst sich von ihren Verwandten und überreicht dir ein kleines Amulett.{/n} "Die Erinnerungen der Menschen sind so flüchtig wie ihr Leben selbst. Doch ich möchte, dass Ihr ein Andenken an unsere gemeinsame Reise habt. Seht es als Symbol des Danks für alles, was Ihr für mich getan habt." {n}Yrliet verabschiedet sich mit einem warmen Lächeln und verschwindet gemeinsam mit den anderen Aeldari im Wald.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wartet, Elantach!" {n}Yrliet löst sich von ihren Verwandten und überreicht dir ein kleines Amulett.{/n} "Erinnerungen sind so flüchtig wie das Leben selbst. Doch ich möchte, dass Ihr ein Andenken an unsere gemeinsame Reise habt. Seht es als Symbol des Danks für alles, was Ihr für mich getan habt." {n}Yrliet verabschiedet sich mit einem warmen Lächeln und verschwindet gemeinsam mit den anderen Aeldari im Wald.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, dur!" {n}Yrliet, soydaşlarından ayrılarak sana ufak bir uğurluk uzatıyor.{/n} "İnsanların hafızası, tıpkı yaşamlarınız gibi gelip geçici. Ancak elinde birlikte yaptığımız yolculuğu hatırlatacak bir şey olsun istedim. Bunu benim için yaptıklarına dair bir minnettarlık sembolü olarak düşün." {n}Yrliet, sıcacık bir gülümsemeyle sana veda ediyor ve diğer Aeldarilerle birlikte ormana doğru ilerleyip gözden kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Wait, elantach!" {n}Yrliet breaks away from her kin and hands you a small amulet.{/n} "Human memories are as fleeting as the span of your lives. But I would like you to have something to remind you of our journey together. Think of it as a symbol of gratitude for all you have done for me." {n}Yrliet bids you farewell with a warm smile and disappears into the woods with the other Aeldari.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, dur!" {n}Yrliet, soydaşlarından ayrılarak sana ufak bir uğurluk uzatıyor.{/n} "İnsanların hafızası, tıpkı yaşamlarınız gibi gelip geçici. Ancak elinde birlikte yaptığımız yolculuğu hatırlatacak bir şey olsun istedim. Bunu benim için yaptıklarına dair bir minnettarlık sembolü olarak düşün." {n}Yrliet, sıcacık bir gülümsemeyle sana veda ederek diğer Aeldarilerle birlikte ormana doğru ilerleyip gözden kayboluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
